fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Banana Slap:** Each night, you can select a player to slap with a banana, distracting them. This roleblock prevents them from performing their night ability and speaking during the next day phase. (Unlimited uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, Cranky Kong gains an additional Banana Slap.
- **Unbridled Rage:** If Cranky Kong is voted to be lynched by the Town, he becomes furious and gains the ability to survive the lynch and counterattack, killing one random player who voted guilty on him. This ability can only be used once per game.
- **Aged Wisdom:** Cranky Kong's defense increases to Powerful if he is the last Brainless faction member alive.
